name: PEW! PEW! (Alpha)
description: This game is not yet complete. It is actually a model/prototype of a future game I would like to make. This game is just helping me be able to make other games. You can play this game. It does not have guns yet. But I wanted to work on core elements like First Person, Main Menu's, and creating Objects. Comment if something is wrong with the zip folder or the game.
